title: Neural Structured Learning - Part 2: Training with natural graphs
excerpt: Welcome to episode 2 of our short series on Neural Structured Learning! In this episode, Software Engineer Arjun Gopalan discusses what natural graphs are and how they can be used to train neural networks.   Graphs are powerful data structures and can be used to represent data that most of us interact
